casebody.data:
No. 69492 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED MARCH 15, 2018

BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON CORPORATION, f/k/a the Bank of New York, as Trustee, ON BEHALF OF the holders of the ALTERNATIVE LOAN TRUST 2005-59, MORTGAGE PASS-THROUGH CERTIFICATES, SERIES 2005-59, Appellant,
v.
SFR INVESTMENTS POOL 1, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; Serrano Community Association, a domestic non-profit corporation; and Nevada Association Services, Inc., a domestic company, Respondents.

AFFIRMED IN PART. VACATED IN PART. REMAND.
